setActivePlayer(int) - Method in class BigTwoConsole
Sets the index of the active player.

shuffle() - Method in class Deck
Shuffles the deck of cards.
Single - Class in <Unnamed>
The class models a hand of Single in Big Two game.
size() - Method in class CardList
Returns the number of cards in this list.
sort() - Method in class CardList
Sorts this list according to the order of the cards.
sortCardsInHand() - Method in class CardGamePlayer
Sorts the list of cards held by this player.
start(BigTwoDeck) - Method in class BigTwo
This method starts the game with a (shuffled) deck of cards supplied as the argument, it implements the Big Two game logics.
